item.description:
Emily is putting together a meetup to check out a restaurant during Providence Restaurant Week for Thursday July 15th! Check back to see which one, it will be posted after the holiday weekend. There is 12 person limit, so RSVP pronto when she posts it so you don't miss out! These are great events - Castle Hill last spring in Newport was AWESOME!

Just a friendly reminder: She is reserving ahead for us - PLEASE do not RSVP unless you are definitely coming!!!

It should be a great time! Check back after the weekend!!!

Yummy deals on fine dining in the city July 11-24. Anyone interested in joining?

Check it out:
http://www.goproviden...

Note from Emily: And... we're on! Apparently New Rivers has been closed for a few days and their answering machine was full. They could only accommodate us @ 7:30pm.

Reservation is under "Providence Collective"
item.name: Providence Restaurant Week - Thursday, July 15th 7:30pm @ New Rivers!
